description: Schema for time-series battery cycling data used in state estimation tasks

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Relative time from start of cycling in seconds

fields.name: current
fields.description: Charge/discharge current (positive for charge, negative for discharge)

fields.name: capacity
fields.description: Measured discharge capacity for the cycle

data_quality.missing_value_handling: Linear interpolation for short gaps (<5 points), discard cycles with >10% missing data
data_quality.outlier_detection: Remove measurements outside 3 sigma from moving average

usage_notes: Each row represents aggregate measurements for one complete cycle
For time-series within-cycle data, use higher temporal resolution
Ensure voltage/current signs follow convention: discharge current is negative
